channel.title: Problems Starting My Sever Please Help!
channel.description: I Have My Client and my no-ip server and all my files but i can't get my server to start and my client to connect someone please help cause i've run outta idea's on how to fix it i've tried everything i can think of... BTW yes i'm a noob but i do know my way around a computer so i know what i'm doing i'm just a little lost on this whole thing i'm trying to build this thing for my little brother and its not working out as easily as i thought it would...

item.title: Problems Starting My Sever Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Dblocknc005 Dblocknc005
item.description:

i already know my computers ip address how do i configure my client to connect to my server ip

item.source: Problems Starting My Sever Please Help!

item.title: Problems Starting My Sever Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

In your server files, right click on the run batch file, then click edit, amke sure it’s your java version, and that your variables are set. Also with your client, make sure you make it connect to your local host, or your server ip.

The local host is either, 0.0.0.0, or 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
